channel.title: « [24/7 VPS] Prisonerz ♞ [728]: (Settled in Western Times)
channel.description:
[img]http://prisonerz.com/logo.png[/img]
[size=1em][font=impact]"Create your own visual style... let it be unique for yourself and yet identifiable for others." - Orson Welles[/font]
Server information:
[ul][li][b]Revision:[/b] 718 / 728 (Matrix)[/li] [li][b]Playable[/b]: Browser and via Game-Client[/li] [li][b]Online:[/b] 24/7 (Updates will be done in 2 minutes)[/li] [li][b]Build:[/b] 1.0[/li] [li][b]Hosted:[/b] USA VPS[/li] [li][b]VPS Speed:[/b] [img]http://www.speedtest.net/result/2704405396.png[/img][/li][/ul]
[hr]
[URL=http://prisonerz.com/play][b][size=30pt]♟ Click here to play! :)[/size][/b][/URL] [URL=http://prisonerz.com/download][b][size=30pt]♙ Download the Client! :)[/size][/b][/URL] [b]READ THIS:[/b] [i]Sometimes in Matrix releases the screen is black at the first login, simply restart your client & it will be gone. this is a one-off thing. And won't happen to you again.[/i] [hr]
[size=14pt][b]What is the idea of this game, what makes it unique?[/b][/size][size=1em] It's been 10 years, you've been in jail since 2003 and your punishment is nearly complete. Since you were leader of the rebellion, everyone saw you as a respected leader; But during your prison years lots of them have been forgotten your name.
[/size][size=18pt][b]Prisonerz Trailer #1[/b][/size][size=1em] [youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UEwg2ATxRqk[/youtube]
[b][i]You got released out of prison.[/i] [/b]But on one condition; The human rights you always had, will be gone. Your respected leader title has been fallen, and is changed to a slaves one. but there's hope, you can train & master your skills again, show people that the respected person you always were has been returned.
[/size][size=18pt][b]Starting up your life again.[/b][/size][size=1em] There you are, on an island in between Karamja and Al Kharid: ♯Sʟᴀᴠᴇ Isʟᴀɴᴅ♯ which contains only the most fearest prison in ☬ Prisonerz ☬.
[b]A Dangerous World.[/b] Ever seen the movie Django Unchained? it has the same idea: The world is tough, like in real life; you can attack anyone, anywhere you are: But this could have consequences, like if the security (players with a higher rank) ever will spot this, you'll have to deal with punishments.
[b]Forms of Danger.[/b] Like in the wild-west, there are people hired by other people to kill a specific player: Bᴏᴜɴᴛʏ Hᴜɴᴛᴇʀs Bounty Hunters, are risking their freedom and are most wanted criminals in-game.
[URL=http://prisonerzofficial.blogspot.nl/p/give-us-feeback.html][b]It would amazing, if you guys could post some feedback on my blog about this RSPS, it would be greatly appreciated! if you would like to do that, click here :)[/b][/URL]
[font=impact]New Login Screen added, made using Photoshop.[/font]
[img]http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-2oVaqezD-ME/UWrJ_C6NC5I/AAAAAAAABCg/6MyqnVem22k/s640/Login+Screen.png[/img]
[font=impact]Progress of the new home I'm adding.[/font]
[img]http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-UbojLnS_apU/UZPnwIeTz1I/AAAAAAAABP8/5EQ0xVNhJ6I/s1600/01.jpg[/img] [img]http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-mBWSQz4Z6aU/UZPnwnTxxHI/AAAAAAAABQI/-Ytw6_qBKuA/s1600/02.jpg[/img] [img]http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-sahbi1bVfG0/UZPnwafkXyI/AAAAAAAABQA/erxELj9nFyg/s1600/03.jpg[/img] [img]http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-JiYavBsqO60/UZPnyI2LXOI/AAAAAAAABQU/0F1dYxGPgeE/s1600/04.jpg[/img] [img]http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-U7rmIAMqdAU/UZPnyQ10AbI/AAAAAAAABQc/CmcDL5EqN6Q/s1600/05.jpg[/img] [img]http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-2qIRuX3AKaA/UZPny_AsA8I/AAAAAAAABQk/kG0cBQEzV9w/s1600/06.jpg[/img] [img]http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-6ZllccyLd4s/UZPn0NdiVrI/AAAAAAAABQs/L6pyCKjPtSA/s1600/07.jpg[/img] [img]http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-3oX6HwM91_s/UZPn0vl0luI/AAAAAAAABQ0/74ieol4R9nQ/s1600/08.jpg[/img][img]http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-4LqfhRvWoNs/UZPn0xX1WQI/AAAAAAAABQ8/iGCL4e3lbCo/s1600/09.jpg[/img] [img]http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-qcQ-hkaF-3E/UZPn1vrDoyI/AAAAAAAABRE/EtQJyT9IezI/s1600/10.jpg[/img] [img]http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-6Eh8SCUOinw/UZPn2Px35MI/AAAAAAAABRM/zWpgu7w5xv8/s1600/11.jpg[/img]
[/size] [hr]
[font=arial black][size=2em]➥ Added To The Project:[/size][/font] [font=trebuchet ms]> Option To Kill, Western Style (Based on Rules). > Crystal Keys + Chest, with a lot of rewards. > Slayer Dungeon, full with monsters. > Old item looks on default. > Jail System Upgraded, with new jail location. > Emotes almost all working flawless. > Western Style RS-Interface (still adding more custom things). > More Items to Shops added, containing Black (G) to Guthix. > People can become Bounty Hunters, (in some special cases). > New Login Screen. > Mod Panel, for Mods and Admins. > Deathtouched darts added (will not be sold in shops, only for special occasions). > Yk'Lagor the Thunderous added. > Resting Glitch Fixed. > More NPC's added in home: Clothes changer, Hairdresser, Gender Changer. > More Shops added in Home. > (Gilded) Altar and Bank Chest in Main Room of Home. > Option To Switch Your Item Looks, by talking to Giles at Home. > New Range Shop, Magic Shop, PVP Store, Herblore, Barrows, Aura, Weapon and Tool store added. > Female Apperance Fixed. > Clan Wars fully working! God portals also added to home. > Added a new King Black Dragon. > Godsword, Spirit Shield and Abyssal Vine Whip creation. > Experience lamps. > Fixed bug in friendslist, online friends will be displayed above all. > Grotworms Dungeon. > Saradomin Godsword FX working. > Snow added, you'll see this when it's gonna be Christmas again. > Summoning Pouch Creation. > All NPC drops are working. > Option to view other players stats, by right-click player. > In-game teleport panel created. > Old item looks, glitches fixed: Dragon Defender and Dharok greataxe not glitchy anymore.[/font]
[CODE]Credits to: DragonKK[/CODE]

item.title: « [24/7 VPS] Prisonerz ♞ [728]: (Settled in Western Times)
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“SlaveScape, post:23, topic:519218”]BUMPING… yeah the hell with you Ruby gtfo

You’ve already been warned once, you’ve now managed to land yourself with read-only privileges to this board. Congratulations.

Lol I’m just sayin’ you can show off as a moderator here. But it doesn’t
make sense, because my friend… All the pro’s are gone. And are now on Rune-Server.org
So, last thing you could do… Is not to piss off people here, take a cab to Mexico or something,
old ass bastard.[/quote]
What lololol.

  1. I’m not showing off.
  2. There are no pros in RSPS, it’s retards working on other retards work.
  3. Rune-server is full of retards.
  4. Not to piss people off? The logout button is right there mate. We could use less of these disrespectful kids such as yourself.
  5. Yes, I’ll take a “cab” (taxi) from Scotland, right over the water and to mexico just for you.
  6. Since when was 18 old?
  7. Enjoy whatever punishment the moderator who takes care of this after me gives you.

Read full topic

item.title: « [24/7 VPS] Prisonerz ♞ [728]: (Settled in Western Times)
item.dc:creator: @SlaveScape SlaveScape
item.description:
@SlaveScape wrote:

k2 k0:

This server is not good. The staff is abusive and the players rage and flame, and threaten to hack your computer. The owner doesn’t even develop and abuses her power. Teleports players into the wilderness and kills them. They player base of 3-4 players are hateful and negative. And today I won 200m from a squal of fortune spin. They automatically say I duped the server, or hacked etc. And attempted to kill me. This server is now worth what it looks. It’s shit, abusive staff. And unfriendly players. I do not recommend this server.

Yes, anything else to say sir? May I please explain to you why “these hateful players” are possible sayin’ that?
First of all, the hell with the 200m you won. SOF is disabled all over the server, and there’s absolutely no way
of gettin’ it. Now you’re saying players, TREATHEN to hack your computer? Wow… be original next time. And
Third above all. The owner you’ve seen, is a an “owner” yes she has right to do whatever the hell she wants,
but I can guarantee you: She’s ain’t abusing anything. She is the most trusted and mature person I know. Maybe you, should try to learn somethin’ from her next time. Instead of just calling it “abusive”. Also, if you checked out the rankings, you my friend, could have seen, that she is only the owner, not the developer buddy. I am. The hell with you, the server is just up for a couple days: you can’t expect a big server at all. We treat our players like brothers, be rude to them and learn
to handle the consequences. There are enough players who can verify the staff is good to the players, and I am definitely gonna keep it like that.

Read full topic

item.title: « [24/7 VPS] Prisonerz ♞ [728]: (Settled in Western Times)
item.dc:creator: @SlaveScape SlaveScape
item.description:
@SlaveScape wrote:

[size=1em][font=impact]“Create your own visual style… let it be unique for yourself and yet identifiable for others.” - Orson Welles[/font]

Server information:

[ul][li]Revision: 718 / 728 (Matrix)[/li]
[li]Playable: Browser and via Game-Client[/li]
[li]Online: 24/7 (Updates will be done in 2 minutes)[/li]
[li]Build: 1.0[/li]
[li]Hosted: USA VPS[/li]
[li]VPS Speed:
[/li][/ul]

[hr]

[size=30pt]♟ Click here to play! :)[/size]
[size=30pt]♙ Download the Client! :)[/size]
READ THIS: Sometimes in Matrix releases the screen is black at the first login, simply restart your client & it will be gone.
this is a one-off thing. And won’t happen to you again.
[hr]

[size=14pt]What is the idea of this game, what makes it unique?[/size][size=1em]
It’s been 10 years, you’ve been in jail since 2003 and your punishment is nearly complete.
Since you were leader of the rebellion, everyone saw you as a respected leader; But during your prison years lots of them have been forgotten your name.

[/size][size=18pt]Prisonerz Trailer #1[/size][size=1em]
[youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UEwg2ATxRqk[/youtube]

You got released out of prison. But on one condition; The human rights you always had, will be gone. Your respected leader title has been fallen, and is changed to a slaves one. but there’s hope, you can train & master your skills again, show people that the respected person you always were has been returned.

[/size][size=18pt]Starting up your life again.[/size][size=1em]
There you are, on an island in between Karamja and Al Kharid: ♯Sʟᴀᴠᴇ Isʟᴀɴᴅ♯ which
contains only the most fearest prison in ☬ Prisonerz ☬.

A Dangerous World.
Ever seen the movie Django Unchained? it has the same idea:
The world is tough, like in real life; you can attack anyone, anywhere you are:
But this could have consequences, like if the security (players with a higher rank) ever will spot this,
you’ll have to deal with punishments.

Forms of Danger.
Like in the wild-west, there are people hired by other people to kill a specific player: Bᴏᴜɴᴛʏ Hᴜɴᴛᴇʀs
Bounty Hunters, are risking their freedom and are most wanted criminals in-game.

It would amazing, if you guys could post some feedback on my blog about this RSPS, it would be greatly appreciated!
if you would like to do that, click here

[font=impact]New Login Screen added, made using Photoshop.[/font]

[font=impact]Progress of the new home I’m adding.[/font]










[/size]
[hr]

[font=arial black][size=2em]➥ Added To The Project:[/size][/font]
[font=trebuchet ms]> Option To Kill, Western Style (Based on Rules).

Crystal Keys + Chest, with a lot of rewards.
Slayer Dungeon, full with monsters.
Old item looks on default.
Jail System Upgraded, with new jail location.
Emotes almost all working flawless.
Western Style RS-Interface (still adding more custom things).
More Items to Shops added, containing Black (G) to Guthix.
People can become Bounty Hunters, (in some special cases).
New Login Screen.
Mod Panel, for Mods and Admins.
Deathtouched darts added (will not be sold in shops, only for special occasions).
Yk’Lagor the Thunderous added.
Resting Glitch Fixed.
More NPC’s added in home: Clothes changer, Hairdresser, Gender Changer.
More Shops added in Home.
(Gilded) Altar and Bank Chest in Main Room of Home.
Option To Switch Your Item Looks, by talking to Giles at Home.
New Range Shop, Magic Shop, PVP Store, Herblore, Barrows, Aura, Weapon and Tool store added.
Female Apperance Fixed.
Clan Wars fully working! God portals also added to home.
Added a new King Black Dragon.
Godsword, Spirit Shield and Abyssal Vine Whip creation.
Experience lamps.
Fixed bug in friendslist, online friends will be displayed above all.
Grotworms Dungeon.
Saradomin Godsword FX working.
Snow added, you’ll see this when it’s gonna be Christmas again.
Summoning Pouch Creation.
All NPC drops are working.
Option to view other players stats, by right-click player.
In-game teleport panel created.
Old item looks, glitches fixed: Dragon Defender and Dharok
greataxe not glitchy anymore.[/font]

Read full topic
